name: ACH_DUAL_WIELDER
description: As the Warrior, kill an enemy with two weapons.

name: ACH_TOUGH
description: As the Troll, heal yourself after rolling a 6 to move.

name: ACH_UNDECIDED
description: As the Druid, change your alignment.

name: ACH_POWERFUL
description: As the Wizard, raise your total Craft to 10.

name: ACH_PEACEFUL
description: As the Monk, increase your Pray score.

name: ACH_ASSASSINATION
description: As the Assassin, assassinate any creature or character.

name: ACH_GRACEFUL
description: As the Elf, move between two Woods spaces.

name: ACH_HOME
description: As the Dwarf, travel to the Mines.

name: ACH_UNDEAD
description: As the Ghoul, raise an Enemy as a Follower.

name: ACH_CHARMING
description: As the Minstrel, charm any Animal.

name: ACH_THIEF
description: As the Thief, steal an Object from the Village.

name: ACH_PERSUASIVE
description: As the Sorceress, beguile another character.

name: ACH_BATTLE_MASTER
description: Earn the Battle Master reward 20 times.

name: ACH_HAG_DELIVERER
description: Earn the Hag Deliverer reward 10 times.

name: ACH_POLTERGEIST_EXORCIST
description: Earn the Poltergeist Exorcist reward 10 times.

name: ACH_PIED_PIPER
description: Earn the Pied Piper reward 10 times.

name: ACH_STRONGEST
description: Earn the Strongest reward 20 times.

name: ACH_MOST_INTELLIGENT
description: Earn the Most Intelligent reward 20 times.

name: ACH_TROPHY_MASTER
description: Earn the Trophy Master reward 10 times.

name: ACH_PVP_MASTER
description: Earn the PvP Master reward 5 times.

name: ACH_BIG_SPENDER
description: Earn the Big Spender reward 10 times.

name: ACH_WINNER
description: Earn the Winner! reward 5 times.

name: ACH_REVENGE
description: Earn the Revenge! reward 10 times.

name: ACH_SPELL_MASTER
description: Earn the Spell Master reward 10 times.

name: ACH_FATE_WEAVER
description: Earn the Fate Weaver reward 5 times.

name: ACH_SPIRIT_DESTROYER
description: Earn the Spirit Destroyer reward 20 times.

name: ACH_PROPHESY
description: As the Prophetess, replace any Adventure Card.

name: ACH_GHOSTBUSTER
description: As the Priest, destroy a Ghost.

name: ACH_ROW_YOUR_BOAT
description: Use a Raft to cross the river.

name: ACH_DICE_WITH_DEATH
displayName: Best of Two out of Three
description: Win a Dice With Death encounter.

name: ACH_ST_GEORGE
description: Kill a Dragon using the Holy Lance.

name: ACH_BATTLE_TOAD
description: Win a Battle as a Toad.

name: ACH_THE_EXORCIST
description: Use the Cross to kill a Demon.

name: ACH_TRAVERSE_VOID
description: Teleport 3 times in 1 turn.

name: ACH_BEAST_OF_BURDEN
description: Collect 8 Objects in one game.

name: ACH_MIDAS_TOUCH
description: Alchemise 8 objects in one game.

name: ACH_TOUCH_OF_DEATH
description: Take the last life of every player in a 6 player game (in combat).

name: ACH_DENIED
description: Get yourself killed whilst someone is on the Crown of Command.

name: ACH_CHALLENGER_APPEARED
description: Kill a player already on the Crown of Command.

name: ACH_STOP_DIVINATION
displayName: These Are Not the Cards You Are Looking For...
description: Prevent someone from casting Divination.

name: ACH_TEMPLE_ESCAPE
description: Escape from the Temple on the first try.

name: ACH_STOP_IMMOBILISE
description: Prevent someone from immobilising you.

name: ACH_FIRST_RUNE
description: Unlock your first Runestone.

name: ACH_FIRST_GOLD_RUNE
description: Unlock your first Gold Runestone.

name: ACH_ALL_RUNES
description: Unlock all Runestones.

name: ACH_SHALL_NOT_CAST
description: Prevent the same person from casting spells 3 times in one game.

name: ACH_UNBELIEVER
description: Win a game without using fate.

name: ACH_IMMORTAL
description: Win a game without losing a life.

name: ACH_ROYAL_ENTOURAGE
description: Have the Prince and Princess as followers at the same time.

name: ACH_FIFTY_ONLINE_GAMES
description: Finish 5 online games.

name: ACH_REAP_MERCHANT
description: As the Merchant, swap an Object for a Magic Object.

name: ACH_REAP_LORD_OF_THE_PIT
description: Move to the Plain of Peril after defeating the Lord of the Pit.

name: ACH_REAP_REAPER_SIX
description: Roll a 6 when confronted by the Reaper.

name: ACH_REAP_SAGE
description: As the Sage, win the game without ever consulting the decks.

name: ACH_REAP_CULTIST
displayName: A Tale of Good and Evil (where Evil wins for a change)
description: As the Dark Cultist, take a life from a character of Good Alignment.

name: ACH_REAP_KNIGHT
description: As the Knight, slay the Miser Dragon.

name: ACH_REAP_REAPER
description: Kill 5 characters with the assistance of the Reaper.

name: ACH_FM_LEPRECHAUN
description: As the Leprechaun, stockpile more than 30 Gold.

name: ACH_FM_OGRE_CHIEFTAIN
description: As the Ogre Chieftain, send a dominated Ogre into battle.

name: ACH_FM_QUEST_ENDING
displayName: I Have Done as You Asked
description: Win a game with the Warlock Quests ending.

name: ACH_FM_ICE_QUEEN
description: Win a game by defeating the Ice Queen.

name: ACH_FM_GIVE_GOLD
description: Give another character some of your Gold.

name: ACH_FM_WARLOCK
displayName: What Else do You Have Back There?
description: As the Warlock, take a card from the Purchase deck as a quest reward.

name: ACH_FM_NECROMANCER
description: As the Necromancer, use an enthralled Spirit in psychic combat.

name: ACH_FM_HYDRA
description: Use the Hydra Spell to cause a Spell to affect all 6 characters.

name: ACH_FM_TRICKSTER
description: Defeat the Trickster and have him steal an Object for you.

name: ACH_FM_TIME_STEAL
description: Steal another player's turn.

name: ACH_FM_TREASURE
description: Use the Treasure Chest (Frostmarch) to draw an Object.

name: ACH_DUNG_AMAZON
description: As the Amazon, redo a battle you would have lost and go on to win.

name: ACH_DUNG_SWASHBUCKLER
description: As the Swashbuckler, defeat a creature in order to take another turn.

name: ACH_DUNG_GLADIATOR
description: As the Gladiator, use 3 trained Followers in a single battle.

name: ACH_DUNG_GYPSY
description: As the Gypsy, use your power of foretelling to avoid 10 Events.

name: ACH_DUNG_PHILOSOPHER
description: As the Philosopher, replace 5 cards from the board.

name: ACH_DUNG_HAG_KEEPER
description: Trick the Dungeon Keeper into taking your Hag.

name: ACH_DUNG_LORD_OF_DARKNESS
description: Have the Lord of Darkness teleport you straight to the Crown of Command.

name: ACH_DUNG_BATTLE_HULK
description: Evade the Battle Hulk.

name: ACH_HLAND_ROGUE
description: As the Rogue, take all the Gold from a character that currently has 5 or more.

name: ACH_HLAND_HIGHLANDER
description: As the Highlander, kill another Highlander character.

name: ACH_HLAND_ALCHEMIST
description: As the Alchemist, alchemise 20 pieces of Gold.

name: ACH_HLAND_BOULDER
description: 'Accidentally' cause the Tumbling Boulder to land on another character.

name: ACH_HLAND_EYRIE
description: Make your way to the Eyrie and defeat the Eagle King.

name: ACH_HLAND_DRAGONS_EYE
description: Use the Dragon's Eye to capture and use a Dragon in battle.

name: ACH_HLAND_HAND_OF_DOOM
description: Cause all players to lose the game.

name: ACH_HLAND_MAGPIE
description: Use the Magpie to find an Object quicker than usual.

name: ACH_HLAND_VAMPIRESS
description: As the Vampiress, relinquish one or more of your followers to the Vampire at the Vampires Tower.

name: ACH_HLAND_SPRITE
description: As the Sprite, have the Pixie and encounter a Fairy.

name: ACH_HLAND_VALKYRIE
displayName: Keeping One's Intentions in the Dark
description: As the Valkyrie, pray at the Graveyard with Good Alignment.

name: ACH_PACK_MARTYR
description: As the Martyr, win a battle by sacrificing a life.

name: ACH_PACK_GENIE
description: As the Genie, rescue the Genie (Follower) from another character after defeating them.

name: ACH_PACK_EXORCIST
description: As the Exorcist, destroy an unusable Object in order to gain a Spell.

name: ACH_PACK_COURTESAN
description: As the Courtesan, seduce another character.

name: ACH_PACK_DEVILS_MINION
description: As the Devil's Minion, acquire the Runesword.

name: ACH_PACK_GAMBLER
description: As the Gambler, tempt fate with another character and win.

name: ACH_PACK_BLACK_WITCH
description: As the Black Witch, successfully resist 3 Spells in a single game.

name: ACH_PACK_NINJA
description: As the Ninja, defeat an Enemy on the City space.

name: ACH_PACK_PIRATE
description: As the Pirate, sell the Pedlar on the black market.

name: ACH_PACK_SHAPE_SHIFTER
description: As the Shape Shifter, take the shape of another character.

name: ACH_QUICK_WIN
description: Win the game within the first 10 rounds.

name: ACH_LEVEL_TEN
description: Reach level 10.

name: ACH_LEVEL_TWENTY
description: Reach level 20.

name: ACH_PACK_APPRENTICE_MAGE
description: As the Apprentice Mage, raise your total Craft to 7 or more.

name: ACH_CITY_BOUNTY_HUNTER
description: As the Bounty Hunter, gain 6 gold from a character bounty.

name: ACH_CITY_CAT_BURGLAR
description: As the Cat Burglar, Burgle the most expensive item from a shop.

name: ACH_CITY_ELEMENTALIST
description: As the Elementalist, automatically defeat an enemy Elemental.

name: ACH_CITY_SPY
description: As the Spy, shadow a character in order to encounter another.

name: ACH_CITY_TAVERN_MAID
description: As the Tavern Maid, pour a drink to more than one character on the same space.

name: ACH_CITY_TINKERER
displayName: I Know What Makes Him Tick
description: As the Tinkerer, defeat a Construct and take it as a trophy.

name: ACH_CITY_MASTER_ASSASSIN
description: Win the game with the Assassins' Guild ending.

name: ACH_CITY_FILTHY_RICH
description: Win the game with the Merchants' Guild ending.

name: ACH_CITY_MASTER_THIEF
description: Win the game with the Thieves' Guild ending.

name: ACH_CITY_HIRED_HITMAN
description: Pay the Assassin to take all of a character’s lives.

name: ACH_CITY_PRISON_BREAK
description: Escape from Jail.

name: ACH_CITY_JACKPOT
description: Win the Lottery.

name: ACH_CITY_KITTED_OUT
description: Have the Flail and Full Plate.

name: ACH_CITY_POTENT_POTABLES
description: Drink five potions in the same turn.

name: ACH_CITY_DAMAGED_GOODS
description: Repair a broken sword or armour at the Armoury.

name: ACH_CITY_ITS_A_LIVING
description: Claim 15 gold in bounties in a single game.

name: ACH_CITY_TORTOISE_AND_HARE
description: Have Terrance and Hopper.

name: ACH_SPOOL_CHIVALRIC_KNIGHT
description: As the Chivalric Knight, assist a character with more strength than you in a battle.

name: ACH_SPOOL_CLERIC
description: As the Cleric, save a follower from death.

name: ACH_SPOOL_DREAD_KNIGHT
description: As the Dread Knight, defeat the Fel Steed.

name: ACH_SPOOL_MAGUS
description: As the Magus, use 3 indoctrinated followers in a single psychic combat.

name: ACH_SPOOL_DEMON_LORD
description: Kill the Demon Lord.

name: ACH_SPOOL_SHARED_GLORY
description: With the Judgement Day ending, have two or more players win the game.

name: ACH_SPOOL_JUDGED_WORTHY
description: Encounter Judgement Day and win the game through being judged worthy.

name: ACH_SPOOL_SACRED_POOL_ENDING
description: Win the game with the Sacred Pool ending.

name: ACH_SPOOL_SHOW_OFF
description: Win the game with the Sacred Pool ending with 8 Quest Rewards.

name: ACH_SPOOL_FREE_RIDE
description: Use the Spiteful Imp to teleport to the Crown of Command.

name: ACH_SPOOL_YOU_SHOULDNT_HAVE
description: Receive 5 or more gold from Generosity.

name: ACH_SPOOL_VINDICATION_MISFORTUNE
description: Use Misfortune on a player rolling for Vindication.

name: ACH_SPOOL_WRATHBORN_WAND_CULTIST
description: Use a Wrathborn Wand to defeat a Wrathborn Cultist.

name: ACH_SPOOL_HOLY_PROFANE_RELICS
description: Have both the Profane and Holy Relics

name: ACH_NETHER_PANDORAS_BOX_WIN
description: Eliminate all other characters with Pandora's Box and win the game.

name: ACH_NETHER_GAUNTLET
description: Successfully navigate the Gauntlet.

name: ACH_NETHER_HUNT
description: Win the game with The Hunt ending.

name: ACH_NETHER_PANDORAS_BOX_SURVIVE
description: Survive the contents of Pandora's Box and win the game.

name: ACH_NETHER_POLYMORPH
description: Defeat a Polymorph or Changeling.

name: ACH_BMOON_DOOMSAYER
description: As the Doomsayer, in one turn, replenish one fate and gain one spell as a result of any player drawing cards.

name: ACH_BMOON_GRAVE_ROBBER
description: As the Grave Robber, draw an object from the top of the discard pile.

name: ACH_BMOON_VAMPIRE_HUNTER
description: As the Vampire Hunter, find the Wooden Stake.

name: ACH_BMOON_LIGHTBEARERS
description: Win the game with the Lightbearers ending.

name: ACH_BMOON_CHARITY
description: Give all your gold to one of your allies.

name: ACH_BMOON_THE_PACK
description: Win the game as a lycanthrope with the Blood Moon Werewolf ending.

name: ACH_BMOON_SILVER_BULLET
description: Win the game by defeating the Blood Moon Werewolf.

name: ACH_BMOON_LIGHTBEARERS_WEREWOLF
description: Win the game as a lycanthrope with the Lightbearers ending.

name: ACH_BMOON_HORRIBLE_BLACK_VOID
description: Meet with a terrible fate.

name: ACH_BMOON_STAKE_VAMPIRE
description: Use the Wooden Stake against the Vampire Prince.

name: ACH_BMOON_MEET_MY_MASTER
description: Force another character to roll on the Werewolf's chart by beating them in combat.

name: ACH_BMOON_LYCANTHROPISH
description: Remove your lycanthropy status using Wolfsbane.

name: ACH_BMOON_WOLF_AMONG_US
description: Encounter Growing Suspicions with a lycanthrope in the game.

name: ACH_FLANDS_NOMAD
description: As the Nomad, encounter the same space as last turn after a Terrain card has been placed on it.

name: ACH_FLANDS_WARLORD
description: As the Warlord, conscript another character's follower.

name: ACH_FLANDS_DERVISH
description: As the Dervish, move 5 or more spaces after defeating an enemy.

name: ACH_FLANDS_JIN_BLOODED
description: As the Jin Blooded, bind a Spell and use it against the original caster.

name: ACH_FLANDS_CROWN_OF_FLAME
description: Pass on the Crown of Flame to another character.

name: ACH_FLANDS_SPREADING_FLAME
description: Win the game with the Spreading Flames ending.

name: ACH_FLANDS_HERO_RISES
description: Win the game with A Hero Rises ending.

name: ACH_FLANDS_PLACE_IN_FLAMES
description: Cause the City or Temple to go up in flames.

name: ACH_FLANDS_NOBLE_IFRIT
description: Defeat one of the Noble Ifrits.

name: ACH_FLANDS_OLD_MAN_OF_THE_SEA
description: Part ways with the Old Man of the Sea at the Tavern.

name: ACH_FLANDS_NO_DAMAGE_FIRE_TOKEN
description: Take no damage when ending your turn on a space with Fireland tokens.

name: ACH_FLANDS_REMOVE_TOKEN_AND_TERRAIN
description: Use Restore the World to remove a Terrain card and a Fireland token from a space.

name: ACH_FLANDS_BURN_OTHER_PLAYERS_CARD
description: Use a card effect to burn another player's Card.

name: ACH_PACK_GOBLIN_SHAMAN
description: As the Goblin Shaman, use a spellbound Goblin to prevent the loss of a life.

name: ACH_PACK_ILLUSIONIST
description: As the Illusionist, get a wish from a stranger by successfully obscuring your alignment.

name: ACH_PACK_JESTER
description: As the Jester, successfully confuse a creature with Strength or Craft 7 or more.

name: ACH_PACK_SHAMAN
description: As the Shaman, take all 3 animal forms in a single game.

name: ACH_PACK_SARACEN
description: As the Saracen, recruit a follower.

name: ACH_PACK_MARTIAL_ARTIST
description: As the Martial Artist, hit someone with a crippling blow when unarmed.

name: ACH_PACK_WITCH_DOCTOR
description: As the Witch Doctor, successfully curse another Witch Doctor.

name: ACH_DRAGON_MINOTAUR
description: As the Minotaur, successfully navigate the Maze.

name: ACH_DRAGON_DRAGON_HUNTER
description: As the Dragon Hunter, trade in a trophy from each Dragon deck at the same time.

name: ACH_DRAGON_FIRE_WIZARD
description: As the Fire Wizard, destroy a Dragon that has a breath attack with your fireblast.

name: ACH_DRAGON_CONJURER
description: As the Conjurer, move a place using your ability.

name: ACH_DRAGON_DRAGON_PRIESTESS
description: As the Dragon Priestess, have a cultist from each Dragon deck as followers at the same time.

name: ACH_DRAGON_DRAGON_RIDER
description: As the Dragon Rider with a captured Dragon, take the Dragon Eggs to the Warlock's Cave and trade them for a Talisman.

name: ACH_DRAGON_DRAGON_SLAYERS
description: When playing with the Dragon Slayers ending, take 5 or more scales from Draconic Lords.

name: ACH_DRAGON_DRAGON_KING
description: When playing with the Dragon King ending, remove the last life off the Dragon King.

name: ACH_DRAGON_DOMAIN_OF_DRAGONS
description: When playing with the Domain of Dragons ending, defeat the Exalted Dragon on the Dragon Tower.

name: ACH_DRAGON_CHALLENGE_CROWN_FIRST
description: When playing with the Challenge for the Crown ending, be the first to step foot in the Dragon Tower after reaching the Crown of Command.

name: ACH_DRAGON_CHALLENGE_CROWN_FINISH
description: Finish the game with the Challenge for the Crown alternate ending.

name: ACH_DRAGON_CONFRONT_DRAGON_KING
description: Defeat the Dragon King in combat.

name: ACH_DRAGON_SLEEPING_DRAGON_TROPHY
displayName: Tread Softly and Carry a Sword
description: Take a sleeping dragon as a trophy.

name: ACH_DRAGON_LUCK_DRAGON
description: Consume the Luck Dragon.

name: ACH_DRAGON_DEADLY_RIVALS
description: Make two Dragons from the same Dragon deck fight to the death.

name: ACH_DRAGON_TWO_HEADS_TWO_WEAPONS
description: Defeat two Dragons with two Holy Lances at the same time.

name: ACH_DRAGON_MARTIAL_ARTIST_TRADE
description: Give your scales to the Martial Artist in exchange for some training.

name: ACH_DRAGON_TWO_HEADED_DRAGON
description: Defeat the Two Headed Dragon.

name: ACH_DRAGON_SLEEP_SLUMBERING_DRAGON
description: Use the Dream Singer to place a Sleep Token on the Slumbering Dragon.

name: ACH_HARB_END_OF_DAYS
description: With the End of Days ending in play, win the game without any Heralds or Horsemen on the board.

name: ACH_HARB_ARMAGEDDON_CROWN
description: When playing with the Armageddon Crown, finish the game on the Crown of Command whilst holding the Apocrypha.

name: ACH_HARB_ASCENDANT_DIVINE
description: As the Ascendant Divine, exhaust all of your Divine Gifts.

name: ACH_HARB_CELESTIAL
description: As the Celestial, defeat an evil character in psychic combat and remove their fate.

name: ACH_HARB_POSSESSED
description: As the Possessed, amass 10 lives.

name: ACH_HARB_STARS_ALIGN
description: Win the game before the Stars Align.

name: ACH_HARB_SHATTERED_WORLD
description: Win the game before the World Shatters.

name: ACH_HARB_RISE_OF_THE_DEAD
description: Win the game before the Dead Rise.

name: ACH_HARB_ARMAGEDDON_OMEN
description: Win the game before the Armageddon.

name: ACH_HARB_STONES_OF_TIME
displayName: Is it future or is it past?
description: Use the stones of time to change the Omen.

name: ACH_HARB_BEAST
description: Placate the Scavenging Beasts by relinquishing a trophy to them.

name: ACH_HARB_SKELETON_KING
description: Defeat the Skeleton King with 3 or more trophies.

name: ACH_PACK_SAMURAI
description: As the Samurai, defeat a Ninja in combat and take their Golden Statue.

name: ACH_PACK_WOODSMAN
description: As the Woodsman, defeat a Wolf in the Woods.

name: ACH_DEEP_KILL_BOSSES
description: Defeat the Rat Queen and Wraith Lord in the same game.

name: ACH_DEEP_THRONE_ROOM
description: Take a Treasure card from the Throne Room after defeating the Wraith Lord.

name: ACH_DEEP_JINX_TURNCOAT
description: Lose the Jinx to the Turncoat card.

name: ACH_DEEP_SPLAT_RAT
description: Defeat an enemy with Rat in its name in the Rat Queen’s Lair.

name: ACH_DEEP_SPIRIT_BEGONE
description: Defeat a Spirit enemy in the Wraith Lord’s Domain.

name: ACH_DEEP_SPHINX
description: Solve the Sphinx of Khayu’s riddle.

name: ACH_DEEP_TRAP_DISARM
description: Have both the Trapsmith and the Skeleton Key in your inventory.

name: ACH_WLAND_JUDGED_BY_FATE
description: With the Judged by Fate ending in play, be the last character still alive with no fate remaining.

name: ACH_WLAND_WANDERLUST
description: Visit every region and win the game with the Wanderlust ending in play having collected at least one Destiny, Relic and Treasure Card.

name: ACH_WLAND_WAR_OF_SEASONS
description: Win the game with the War of Seasons ending in play by being the first to defeat Oberon or Titania.

name: ACH_WLAND_ANCIENT_OAK
description: As the Ancient Oak, have 5 Growth tokens on your character card.

name: ACH_WLAND_LEYWALKER
description: As the Leywalker, travel by Portal tokens on 3 consecutive turns.

name: ACH_WLAND_SCOUT
description: As the Scout, have all your Hidden Path tokens on Place cards.

name: ACH_WLAND_SPIDER_QUEEN
description: As the Spider Queen have all of your Spider tokens Crawler side up.

name: ACH_WLAND_TOTEM_WARRIOR
description: As the Totem Warrior, take a Totem Spirit token from a Totem Bear.

name: ACH_WLAND_MEETING_WITH_DESTINY
description: Gain a Destiny Card whilst at the Meeting with Destiny space.

name: ACH_WLAND_SURVIVE_TRANSFORMED
description: Survive the effect of the Transformed and return to your original character.

name: ACH_WLAND_TOAD_KING
displayName: In the Court of the Toadstool King
description: Encounter the Toad King whilst you are a Toad.

name: ACH_WLAND_BOUND_FOR_GLORY
description: In one game be Lightbound, Darkbound, Unbound and Fateless.

name: ACH_WLAND_RIDDLE_STONE
description: Gain 3 or more Spells from the Riddle Stone.

name: ACH_CATA_LANDS_OF_WONDER
description: Using the Lands of Wonder ending, make two successful rolls in one turn.

name: ACH_CATA_ONE_TALISMAN
description: Using the One Talisman ending, have the One Talisman change hands over 10 times in one game.

name: ACH_CATA_ETERNAL_CROWN
description: Using the Eternal Crown ending, win the game whilst stood on the the Crown of Command.

name: ACH_CATA_CULT_OF_DAMNED
description: Using the Cult of the Damned ending, successfully defeat the Denizen horde.

name: ACH_CATA_ARCANE_SCION
description: As the Arcane Scion, gain 5 Spells as a result of other characters gaining Craft in one game.

name: ACH_CATA_BARBARIAN
description: As the Barbarian, successfully protect yourself from psychic combat.

name: ACH_CATA_BLACK_KNIGHT
displayName: Blighted Blade of the Old World
description: As the Black Knight, encounter the Black Knight at the Castle and force another character to lose a life.

name: ACH_CATA_MUTANT
description: As the Mutant, successfully mutate 3 turns in a row.

name: ACH_CATA_SCAVENGER
description: As the Scavenger, use your scavenging ability to take the Cataclysm Blade.

name: ACH_SPIRIT_CLAIRVOYANT
description: As the Clairvoyant, move the Medium to the bottom of the deck.

name: ACH_SPIRIT_ARCHON
description: As the Archon, kill 3 characters at once using your overload ability.

name: ACH_SPIRIT_SPECTRE_COLLECTOR
description: As the Spectre Collector, collect the Spectre.

name: ACH_SPIRIT_NIGHT_OF_THE_DANCING_SKULLS
description: In the Night of the Dancing Skulls ending kill another player as a result of combat as a Ghost.

name: ACH_SPIRIT_THE_WHITE_CROWN
description: Deliver the Fallen Talisman to the King of the Dead during the White Crown ending.

name: ACH_BEAST_SPECIALIST
description: As the Specialist, complete all of your Catalogue tokens.

name: ACH_BEAST_TROPHY_HUNTER
description: As the Trophy Hunter, take down one of the Ancient Beasts.

name: ACH_BEAST_GLAIVE
description: Win the game by collecting soul fragments with the Glaive of Kallind.

name: ACH_BEAST_BEAST_HUNT
description: Win the game using The Greatest Hunter ending

name: ACH_BEAST_HUNTERS
description: Share victory with your companions when using the Awakening ending.

name: ACH_PACK_PATHFINDER
description: As the Pathfinder, locate the barbarian and the ranger in one game.

name: ACH_CLOCK_RUNIC_REVOLUTION
description: Win the game by defeating the most Constructs whilst using the Runic Revolution ending.

name: ACH_CLOCK_ERA_OF_INVENTION
description: Defeat your competition whilst using the Era of Invention ending.

name: ACH_CLOCK_ARTIFICER
description: As the Artificer, absorb the powers of a Cursed Object.

name: ACH_CLOCK_CONMAN
description: As the Swindler, use your cunning to swindle the Thief.

name: ACH_CLOCK_ENGINEER
description: As the Engineer, use your skills to enhance 5 Inventions in a single game.

name: ACH_CLOCK_DOG_BONE
description: Have the Clockwork Dog aid you in battle.
